channel.title: Coder here helping all
channel.description:
hey guys you might renember me my last owned server was 'onescape'
a nice server
okay add my msn blondey2010s@hotmail.com
im helping all the new learning people to code +++ and making servers im willing to help anybody with what i can im online on msn most of the time so just add me and i can teach you threw steps or use www.teamviewer.com
ps.
i have being coding for a while now so im experienced and i can help any1 when im spare :)
i can do portforwardings making blank's making server online codeing items etc...
:)

item.title: Coder here helping all
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Mk bruh, it doesn’t matter.
If it’s not you, it’s another asswipe ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Coder here helping all
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:13, topic:355789”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=452337.msg3884523#msg3884523 date=1326326562]
We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought.
[/quote]
I love hearing that so much, you’re just saying it because you heard/seen it from another.
(Guaranteed…).
It’s called being “helpful”, someone asks some shit they don’t know, don’t be a troll and deny them with the response “we’re not a spoonfeeding community”, :L[/quote]

-yea your right I did see it from someone else its a staff global moderator name Taharok and its posted on this sections rules!

here take a look:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,331370.0.html

It’s actually common sense but people like you don’t read the rules/section rules before joining… so don’t give me the bs and you clearly don’t understand what spoonfeeding is? your saying to be “helpful” yea we respond to the problems they are having but we are not gonna consistently do the work for them, if someone does the work for them its like they are learning nothing! for themself and can only depend on someone else’s work. :eek:

Also, he’s not asking for help he’s offering to help code for people which is consider spoonfeeding towards the community

Read full topic

item.title: Coder here helping all
item.dc:creator: @iownmyscape iownmyscape
item.description:
@iownmyscape wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:14, topic:355789”][quote author=purestmage74 link=topic=452337.msg3884615#msg3884615 date=1326331689]

We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought.

I love hearing that so much, you’re just saying it because you heard/seen it from another.
(Guaranteed…).
It’s called being “helpful”, someone asks some shit they don’t know, don’t be a troll and deny them with the response “we’re not a spoonfeeding community”, :L
[/quote]
Read the sectional rules then. It’s basic stuff and even if they don’t know it, they should attempt to figure it out instead of whining to others for help. It’s basically a trial to see if they are really worth the time and can make something useful.[/quote]
please read my post and help java

Read full topic

item.title: Coder here helping all
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:13, topic:355789”][quote author=ultimatepkvillage link=topic=452337.msg3884523#msg3884523 date=1326326562]
We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought.
[/quote]
I love hearing that so much, you’re just saying it because you heard/seen it from another.
(Guaranteed…).
It’s called being “helpful”, someone asks some shit they don’t know, don’t be a troll and deny them with the response “we’re not a spoonfeeding community”, :L[/quote]
Read the sectional rules then. It’s basic stuff and even if they don’t know it, they should attempt to figure it out instead of whining to others for help. It’s basically a trial to see if they are really worth the time and can make something useful.

Read full topic
